title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM or embeddings provider in chains & agents.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama (now renamed “Open WebUI”); supports RAG, multimodal, admin panel.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder API, streaming, and Android compatibility.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing strongly-typed async wrappers over Ollama’s REST endpoints.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement with inline completions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & PVC support.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Minimal Next.js chatbot template that streams responses from Ollama over the REST API.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Electron desktop app for chatting with local Ollama models; supports markdown & code blocks.

title: ollama-models
summary: Official registry of Modelfiles for Llama 3, Phi-3, Mistral, CodeLlama, Gemma, etc., ready to pull.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Docker-compose stack bundling Ollama, Open WebUI, Weaviate, and QDrant for instant RAG playgrounds.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in production NLP pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET library that wraps Ollama’s REST API with async/await, streaming, and strongly-typed DTOs.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced command-line tool for chatting, bulk model pulls, and conversation history stored locally.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Simple retrieval-augmented generation demo using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that lets teams chat with local Ollama models via slash commands and DMs.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord.py bot bringing Ollama models to servers with role-based access, slash commands, and conversation memory.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package for JavaScript/TypeScript developers; same feature parity as ollama-js repo.
